content: designer note this pattern is sized to 3x the finished measurements below are intended **not** to fit all the way around the body the garment is open in front by at least 4-6 inches the garment is fitted around the bodice and sleeves if you prefer more ease you will want to choose a size up than normal although this design is made with two yarns there is absolutely no reason why you couldn t make the entire piece in one color throughout note this pattern calls for both simply soft shadows and simply soft the one noted as a in the pattern is actually simply soft not shadows finished measurements chest 29 32 34 37½ 40½ 44 -inches/73 5 81 5 86 5 95 5 103 112 cm length 29 30 31 31 32 32 -inches/73 5 76 78 5 78 5 81 5 81 5 cm note jacket is designed to be worn with fronts open jacket will fit bust measuring 6 10-inches/15 25 5cm larger than finished chest measurement of jacket jacket will lengthen 1-2-inches/2 5-5cm when worn gauge in pattern stitch as established using h-8 5mm hook 17 sts and 14 row = 5-inches/12 5cm >since this pattern is no longer available at the caron website i have been given written permission to provide the pdf on ravelry
